description:
Kamisaka Haruhi is one of the mages in training at Mizuhosaka Academy who on Valentine`s Day, runs into Kohinata Yuuma, who she believes may be a boy she`s been trying to find for years. After the magic section of the academy suffers from a gas explosion, Haruhi and her friends transfer over to the normal section and Haruhi ends up in Yuuma`s class.
Source: Wiki
